html.p: This report will check the top scheduled searches, sorted by total runtime. The scan_count shows how many events were looked at on disk, the event_count shows how many events were actually returned (for example, a rare search for search index=* | search uniquestring will do a full table scan with a very high scan_count and very low event_count, but search index=* uniquestring will have a low scan_count and event_count).

table.title: Saved Searches
table.searchString: | tstats count sum(total_run_time) avg(total_run_time) avg(scan_count) avg(event_count) values(user) from `SA_SearchHistory` where searchtype=scheduled by savedsearch_name | sort - "sum(total_run_time)"
